question: What is the function of the SSX proteins?
ideal_answer: The SYT protein appears to act as a transcriptional co-activator and the SSX proteins as co-repressors

The synovial-sarcoma-associated SS18-SSX2 fusion protein induces epigenetic gene (de)regulation.

The SSX family of cancer-testis antigens as target proteins for tumor therapy
